base.footer: This is an automated message from Barksys. Please do not reply to this email.
base.supportMessage: Need help? Contact our support team

onboarding.title: Welcome to Barksys!
onboarding.instructions: To complete your onboarding, you need to activate your account and register your company information.
onboarding.validityNotice: This link is valid for 24 hours
onboarding.alternativeInstructions: Copy and paste this link into your browser:
timeLimitList: This link will expire in 24 hours
After expiration, you can request a new onboarding link
If you didn't receive this email, check your spam folder
onboarding.notYouInstructions: If you didn't create this account, you can safely ignore this email. However, we recommend:
notYouList: Do not click the onboarding link
If you continue receiving these emails, contact our support team
onboarding.helpMessage: If you have any questions or need assistance during the onboarding process, our support team is ready to help!
onboarding.closingMessage: We're excited to have you on our platform!

passwordReset.title: Password Reset Request
passwordReset.instructions: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password.
passwordReset.validityNotice: This link is valid for 1 hour
passwordReset.alternativeInstructions: Copy and paste this link into your browser:
timeLimitList: This link will expire in 1 hour
After expiration, you'll need to request a new password reset
For security, all existing sessions will be terminated after password change
passwordReset.notYouInstructions: If you didn't request a password reset, your account may be at risk. We recommend:
notYouList: Do not click the reset link
Change your password immediately through the login page
passwordReset.securityMessage: Never share your password or reset links with anyone. Barksys will never ask for your password via email.
securityList: This link will expire in 1 hour
Do not share this link with anyone
passwordReset.closingMessage: If you have any concerns about your account security, please contact us immediately.

packagePurchased.title: New Package Purchase
packagePurchased.message: A tutor from your company has just purchased a training package.
packagePurchased.infoMessage: You can view and manage this purchase in your admin dashboard.

trainingSessionEnrolled.title: Training Session Scheduled
trainingSessionEnrolled.message: Your training session has been successfully scheduled!
trainingSessionEnrolled.cancelMessage: If you need to cancel this session, click the button below:
trainingSessionEnrolled.cancelNotice: Cancelling will free up the slot and credit the session back to your package.
trainingSessionEnrolled.alternativeInstructions: Copy and paste this link into your browser:
trainingSessionEnrolled.importantMessage: Please cancel at least 24 hours in advance to avoid penalties.

trainingSessionConfirmed.title: Training Session Confirmed
trainingSessionConfirmed.message: A training session enrollment has been confirmed!
trainingSessionConfirmed.infoMessage: The tutor has confirmed their attendance. The session is now confirmed in your schedule.

trainingSessionCancelled.title: Training Session Cancelled
trainingSessionCancelled.message: A training session enrollment has been cancelled.
trainingSessionCancelled.infoMessage: The slot has been freed and the session credit has been returned to the tutor's package.

passwordChanged.title: Password Changed Successfully
passwordChanged.message: Your password has been successfully changed. All your active sessions have been terminated for security.
passwordChanged.successMessage: Your password has been changed successfully. You can now use your new password to log in.
passwordChanged.notYouMessage: If you did not authorize this password change, your account may be compromised. Take immediate action:
tipsList: Never share your password with anyone
Use a unique password for each service

trainingSessionUpdated.title: Training Session Updated
trainingSessionUpdated.message: A training session schedule has been updated.
trainingSessionUpdated.closingMessage: If you have any questions about these changes, please contact the trainer or our support team.
trainingSessionUpdated.footerText: This is an automated message from Barksys.
